DOC.brief_summary: The investigator try understand impact new VA/DoD cholesterol guideline primary care clinic VA clinic could help clinician teamlets improve statin use . To , investigator talk provider guideline perform brief intervention help provider meet guideline ' recommendation .
DOC.detailed_description: The VA/DoD Committee Clinical Practice Guidelines Management Dyslipidemia Cardiovascular Risk Reduction create clinical practice guideline officially adopt VA . The new guideline substantially different previous guideline , arguably somewhat complicate . Complicating matter somewhat , American Heart Association American College Cardiology pass similar , identical , guideline one year earlier VA also plan adopt HEDIS ( Healthcare Effectiveness Data Information Set ) performance measure manage dyslipidemia , also similar , identical VA guideline . Changing recommendation plus misalignment - two guideline , one performance measure , none identical perfectly-understood - could create confusion unclear guidance practitioner . The investigator propose partnership CAR VA Ann Arbor Primary Care QI project improve adoption guideline time resource-efficient implementation strategy test ten PACT teamlets . As part large project , investigator design efficient , multi-pronged intervention improve statin use . The investigator first develop preliminary intervention . The investigator already conduct assessment barrier facilitator implementation obtain provider feedback improve plan intervention develop idea make good . The intervention two part . First , clinicians VA Ann Arbor receive educational session new guideline . Second , investigator randomly divide PACT teamlets half . One half , `` usual care , '' receive change VA plan new guideline . The provider `` intervention '' group receive full intervention . This include personalized decision support tool every guideline-discordant patient time intervention base VA guideline . They also receive automate personalized audit feedback report base guideline investigator develop together VA 's Center Analytics Reporting ( CAR ) . Providers also receive poster clinical room alert patient guideline change .
DOC.criteria: Practicing PACT primary care physician Ann Arbor VA Healthcare System .
